entry.title: Mariupol's Last Defenders Yield, Ending Long Russian Siege
entry.content: Completing the capture of Mariupol is a long sought victory for Russia, and Ukrainian soldiers are being taken from the Azovstal steel plant to Russian-controlled territory. Kyiv is pushing for a prisoner swap.

entry.title: China Eastern Black Box Points to Intentional Nosedive
entry.content: Flight data suggests that someone in the cockpit of the Boeing 737-800 that crashed in March put the aircraft into a near-vertical descent, according to a preliminary U.S. assessment.

entry.title: How Germany Is Racing to Sever Dependence on Russian Energy
entry.content: Europeâ€™s largest economy is scrambling to find new suppliers and invest billions in infrastructure to reverse decades of policy in weeks; business leaders warn of a financial crisis from higher energy prices.
